sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Short Interest in M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (NASDAQ:MBAV) Increases By 841.4%
feed.summary: Short interest in M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (NASDAQ:MBAV) surged by 841.4% as of December 15th, totaling 444,946 shares. Despite this, the short interest ratio remains low at 0.5 days based on average trading volume. Insider activity shows major shareholder Fitzgerald & Co. Cantor significantly increased its stake, while analyst sentiment generally points to a "Sell" rating for the stock.

feed.title: Fitzgerald & Co. Cantor Buys 3,529,081 Shares of M3-Brigade Acquisition V (NASDAQ:MBAV) Stock
feed.summary: Fitzgerald & Co. Cantor recently acquired 3,529,081 shares of M3-Brigade Acquisition V (NASDAQ:MBAV) stock for over $38 million, increasing their direct holding by 83.02%. Despite this significant purchase, M3-Brigade Acquisition V stock traded up slightly, but analyst sentiment from Weiss Ratings remains negative with a "Sell" rating. M3-Brigade Acquisition V is a SPAC focused on business combinations in the healthcare and life sciences sectors.

feed.title: Meteora Capital LLC Has $7.15 Million Stock Position in M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. $MBAV
feed.summary: Meteora Capital LLC significantly increased its stake in M3-Brigade Acquisition V (NASDAQ:MBAV) by 259.8% in Q2, bringing its total holding to $7.15 million and making it the 28th-largest position in its portfolio. Other institutional investors like Clear Street, Tuttle Capital, Levin Capital, JPMorgan Chase, and Geode also increased or initiated positions, indicating growing institutional interest. Despite this, analyst sentiment remains negative, with a consensus "Sell" rating for the blank-check SPAC.

feed.title: Harraden Circle Investments LLC Takes $28.82 Million Position in M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. $MBAV
feed.summary: Harraden Circle Investments LLC acquired a significant $28.82 million stake in M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (MBAV) during Q2, making it their second-largest position and representing about 7.1% ownership of MBAV. Despite this increased institutional interest from several firms, analyst sentiment for MBAV remains negative, with a consensus "Sell" rating. The stock's price performance shows movement within a 52-week range of $10.04 to $13.73, with current trading around $10.68.

feed.title: ReserveOne Announces Filing of Registration Statement on Form S-4 with the SEC for Proposed Business Combination with M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp.
feed.summary: ReserveOne and M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. announced that ReserveOne Holdings, Inc. (Pubco) has filed a registration statement on Form S-4 with the SEC regarding their proposed business combination. The filing is a key step towards Pubco being listed on Nasdaq under the ticker symbol "RONE" after the transaction closes, subject to SEC review and shareholder approval. This move follows a previously announced confidential submission and aims to merge ReserveOne's digital asset investment focus with M3-Brigade's SPAC structure.

feed.title: ReserveOne Announces Filing of Registration Statement on Form S-4 with the SEC for Proposed Business Combination with M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp.
feed.summary: ReserveOne Holdings, Inc. (Pubco) has filed a registration statement on Form S-4 with the SEC for its proposed business combination with M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. The proposed combined entity, expected to list on Nasdaq as "RONE," aims to manage a diversified portfolio of cryptocurrencies and digital assets. This filing marks progress in the SEC review process, following the initial announcement of the business combination on July 8, 2025.

feed.title: ReserveOne Announces Filing of Registration Statement on Form S-4 with the SEC for Proposed Business Combination with M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp.
feed.summary: ReserveOne Holdings, Inc. announced the public filing of a registration statement on Form S-4 with the SEC for its proposed business combination with M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. This marks a significant step towards the merger, which was initially announced on July 8, 2025. Upon completion, ReserveOne (Pubco) will be listed on Nasdaq under the ticker symbol "RONE", focusing on investing in and managing a diversified portfolio of cryptocurrencies and digital assets.

feed.title: M3-Brigade (NYSE: MBAV) and ReserveOne detail diversified digital asset treasury vision
feed.summary: M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (MBAV) and ReserveOne have elaborated on their business combination and ReserveOne's strategy as a diversified, yield-bearing digital asset treasury platform. ReserveOne aims to serve conservative, advisor-led investors through diversified token strategies, distinguishing between traditional credit risk and crypto-specific protocol and complexity risks in DeFi. The company emphasizes its blend of traditional finance and native crypto expertise to navigate regulatory challenges and build institutional-scale digital asset treasuries.

feed.title: M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. SEC 10-Q Report
feed.summary: M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (MBAV), a SPAC, has released its Q3 2025 10-Q report, detailing significant financial gains, including $4.61 million in net income, and strategic business developments. The company entered a Business Combination Agreement with ReserveOne, Inc. on July 7, 2025, which anticipates Pubco becoming a publicly traded company by Q1 2026. MBAV has also secured significant investment commitments through equity PIPE and convertible note subscription agreements.

feed.title: M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (NASDAQ:MBAV) Short Interest Down 68.2% in September - MarketBeat
feed.summary: M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (NASDAQ:MBAV) experienced a significant 68.2% reduction in short interest during September, with total shares sold short decreasing to 16,700. Despite this, several hedge funds either initiated or increased their stakes in the company in the second quarter. The stock traded up $0.01 during mid-day trading and maintains a "Sell" rating from Weiss Ratings.

feed.title: Tuttle Capital Management LLC Invests $437,000 in M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. $MBAV
feed.summary: Tuttle Capital Management LLC has invested $437,000 in M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (NASDAQ:MBAV), acquiring 38,750 shares, which constitutes 1.8% of its portfolio. Concurrently, Wolverine Asset Management LLC increased its stake in MBAV by 16.8%, now holding over 510,000 shares. Wall Street analysts currently have a "Sell" consensus rating on M3-Brigade Acquisition V.

feed.title: M3-Brigade Acquisition V (NASDAQ:MBAV) Given "Sell (D)" Rating at Weiss Ratings - MarketBeat
feed.summary: M3-Brigade Acquisition V (NASDAQ:MBAV) has received a "sell (d)" rating from Weiss Ratings. The stock traded down 0.5% in mid-day trading, reaching $10.57, with a trading volume of 82,983 shares. Several institutional investors have adjusted their holdings in MBAV, including Wolverine Asset Management LLC, Tuttle Capital Management LLC, and MMCAP International Inc. SPC.

feed.title: ReserveOne files with SEC to advance $1 billion Nasdaq listing via SPAC merger
feed.summary: ReserveOne, a new crypto asset management firm, has confidentially filed a draft Form S-4 with the SEC for a proposed merger with M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp, a blank-check company. This move aims to achieve a Nasdaq listing and raise over $1 billion. The firm plans to implement a diversified digital asset treasury strategy, holding and managing cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana, with potential for yield generation.

feed.title: M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (NASDAQ:MBAV) institutional investors have had a good week as stock gains 10%
feed.summary: Institutional investors of M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (NASDAQ:MBAV) have seen a positive week with a 10% stock gain, largely due to their significant 64% ownership stake in the company. This substantial institutional holding suggests credibility in the investment community, but also makes the stock vulnerable to their collective trading decisions. The article breaks down the ownership structure, noting significant holdings by M3-Brigade Sponsor V LLC and hedge funds, while also considering general public and private company ownership.

feed.title: M3-Brigade Acquisition Corp. names Reeve Collins as CEO
feed.summary: M3-Brigade Acquisition V Corp. (NASDAQ: MBAVU, MBAV, MBAVW) has appointed Reeve Collins, co-founder of Tether, as its new CEO following a significant share and warrant transaction. The company, which focuses on identifying business combinations in the digital assets sector, also plans to rebrand as CCRC Digital Assets Corp. This leadership change brings extensive experience in digital assets and private equity, positioning M3-Brigade for growth in its target sector.
